allOf.description: TCPSocketAction describes an action based on opening a socket

host.description: Optional: Host name to connect to, defaults to the pod IP.

not.description: Represents a host path mapped into a pod. Host path volumes do not support ownership management or SELinux relabeling.

path.description: Path of the directory on the host. If the path is a symlink, it will follow the link to the real path. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes#hostpath

type.description: Type for HostPath Volume Defaults to "" More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/storage/volumes#hostpath
